DOC.brief_title: Research Aging Project Iceland : Second Stage
DOC.detailed_description: In anticipation sequence human genome description human proteome , Age , Gene/Environment Susceptibility-Reykjavik Study ( AGES ) initiate 2002 . AGES design examine risk factor , include genetic susceptibility gene/environment interaction , relation disease disability old age . The study multidisciplinary , provide detailed phenotype relate cardiovascular , neurocognitive ( include sensory ) , musculoskeletal system , body composition metabolic regulation . Relevant quantitative trait , subclinical indicator disease , medical diagnosis identify use biomarkers , image , physiologic indicator . The AGES sample drawn establish population-based cohort , Reykjavik Study . This cohort men woman born 1907 1935 follow Iceland since 1967 Icelandic Heart Association . The AGES cohort , cardiovascular risk factor assessment earlier life detail late- life phenotype quantitative trait , create comprehensive study age nest relatively genetically homogeneous old population .
